name: Paper Summoner
description:
The tower of the hourglass has been taken over by evil forces!
Fight your enemies with you magic spells, keep the rhythm and don’t forget to dodge their attacks when 10 seconds have passed!
Your summoned spirits can protect you, but they aren’t undefeatable, once they are K.O. you wont even be able to attack your foes.
Learn new summoning spell by levelling up and go as far as you can through the portals if you dare!
